messages.content: You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
What types of furniture does ComfortLiving offer?
ComfortLiving offers a wide range of furniture including sofas, beds, dining tables, chairs, and storage solutions.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Where can I buy ComfortLiving furniture?
You can purchase ComfortLiving furniture through our online store or at any of our physical retail locations.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Does ComfortLiving offer home delivery?
Yes, ComfortLiving offers home delivery services for all purchases made online or in-store.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
How long does delivery take?
Delivery times vary depending on your location but typically range from 3 to 7 business days.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
What materials are used in ComfortLiving furniture?
ComfortLiving furniture is made from high-quality materials including solid wood, metal, and durable upholstery fabrics.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Does ComfortLiving offer customization options?
Yes, ComfortLiving offers customization options for certain furniture items, including fabric choices and finishes.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
How can I contact ComfortLiving customer service?
You can contact ComfortLiving customer service via email at support@comfortliving.com or by calling our toll-free number 1-800-123-4567.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Does ComfortLiving have a return policy?
Yes, ComfortLiving has a 30-day return policy for unused and undamaged items.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Are there any warranties on ComfortLiving furniture?
Yes, ComfortLiving provides a 1-year warranty on all furniture items.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Where is ComfortLiving furniture manufactured?
ComfortLiving furniture is manufactured in our state-of-the-art facility located in North Carolina, USA.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Does ComfortLiving offer assembly services?
Yes, ComfortLiving offers assembly services for an additional fee.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Can I track my ComfortLiving order?
Yes, you can track your order using the tracking number provided in your shipment confirmation email.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Does ComfortLiving have a physical showroom?
Yes, ComfortLiving has several showrooms across the country where you can view and purchase our furniture.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Are ComfortLiving products environmentally friendly?
ComfortLiving is committed to sustainability and uses eco-friendly materials and processes whenever possible.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Does ComfortLiving offer financing options?
Yes, ComfortLiving offers financing options through our partnership with Affirm.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
How do I clean ComfortLiving upholstered furniture?
To clean ComfortLiving upholstered furniture, we recommend using a mild detergent and water for spot cleaning or professional upholstery cleaning services.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Can I order replacement parts for my ComfortLiving furniture?
Yes, replacement parts for ComfortLiving furniture can be ordered through our customer service department.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Does ComfortLiving offer gift cards?
Yes, ComfortLiving offers gift cards that can be purchased and redeemed online or in-store.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Are there any ongoing promotions at ComfortLiving?
You can check our website or sign up for our newsletter to stay updated on current promotions and discounts.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
How do I assemble ComfortLiving furniture?
ComfortLiving furniture comes with detailed assembly instructions. You can also find assembly videos on our website.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
What payment methods does ComfortLiving accept?
ComfortLiving accepts various payment methods including credit cards, PayPal, and financing through Affirm.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Can I cancel or change my ComfortLiving order?
You can cancel or change your order within 24 hours of purchase by contacting our customer service.

Does ComfortLiving offer design consultation services?
Yes, ComfortLiving offers free design consultation services to help you create your perfect space.

How do I know if a ComfortLiving item is in stock?
You can check the availability of items on our website or by contacting our customer service.

Can I request fabric swatches from ComfortLiving?
Yes, you can request free fabric swatches through our website to help you choose the perfect material.
